    Getting Started with Brightcove Video Connect for Adobe Experience Manager

    This topic provides an overview of Brightcove Video Connect for Adobe Experience Manager.
    Notes:
    • Brightcove offers an onboarding package to help you with the initial installation and configuration of the connector - we strongly encourage you to take advantage of this to insure that the implementation goes smoothly. Contact your account manager for details.
    • Links to all releases and changelogs can be found on the Releases page.
    • Version 5.7 of the connector is now available with support for AEM Cloud as a Service.
    • Version 5.5.4 of the connector will no longer be supported as of October 1, 2022.
    • Support for AEM v6.2 ended as of January 1, 2021.
    Plug-in Version Documentation Download Compatibility Notes
    6.0
    • Overview
    • Installation (Cloud Version)
    • Installation (On-Premise Version)
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    • Cloud Version<
    • On-Premise Version<
    /td>
    Version 6.0 introduces major new features - support for:
    • Subfolders
    • Labels
    • Clips
    • Scheduled Activation
    • Creating Playlists
    • Multilingual Metadata
    • Supports AEM Cloud as a Service
    • Major revamp of AEM Authoring
    • Updated Brightcove landing page for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove component library for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove components to include in-place editing and asset drag and drop functionalities
    • Implementing latest OSGi annotations and model classes where required
    • Ability to sync, manage folders
    • Major improvements to Metadata editing and management
    • Ability to create, manage and delete playlists
    • Support for iFrame embeds
    • Support for In-Page Experiences (IPX)
    5.7
    • Overview
    • Installation
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    		 Plugin with Source
    Version 5.7 is functionally identical to 5.6. The only difference between the two is:
    • v5.7 of the connector only works with AEM Cloud as a Service.
    • v5.6 is only for AEM on-prem/managed service.
    • Supports AEM Cloud as a Service
    • Major revamp of AEM Authoring
    • Updated Brightcove landing page for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove component library for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove components to include in-place editing and asset drag and drop functionalities
    • Implementing latest OSGi annotations and model classes where required
    • Ability to sync, manage folders
    • Major improvements to Metadata editing and management
    • Ability to create, manage and delete playlists
    • Support for iFrame embeds
    • Support for In-Page Experiences (IPX)
    5.6
    • Overview
    • Installation
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    		 Plugin with Source
    • Supports AEM 6.5.x only
    • Major revamp of AEM Authoring
    • Updated Brightcove landing page for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove component library for Touch UI
    • Updated Brightcove components to include in-place editing and asset drag and drop functionalities
    • Implementing latest OSGi annotations and model classes where required
    • Ability to sync, manage folders
    • Major improvements to Metadata editing and management
    • Ability to create, manage and delete playlists
    • Support for iFrame embeds
    • Support for In-Page Experiences (IPX)
    5.5.4
    • Overview
    • Installation
    • Configuration
    • Using the Connector
    		 Plugin with Source
    Version 5.5.4 will no longer be supported as of October 1, 2022.
    • Supports AEM 6.4, 6.3
    • Removes hardcoded ingest profile if no value selected in the AEM OSGi config
    • Embeds Brightcove HTML5 Player
    • Supports Classic UI and Touch UI
    • Uses AEM asset manager
    • Added UTF-8 multi-language support
    • Extended Proxy support for S3 video upload
    5.5.0 EOL EOL End of Life as of January 1, 2020
    5.1.1 EOL EOL End of Life as of January 1, 2019
    4.2.0 EOL EOL End of Life as of December 31, 2017
    4.1.2 EOL EOL End of Life as of December 31, 2017

    For help with this connector, please fill out this worksheet and include it with a support ticket to Brightcove customer support.
